segments.text: Excuse me , I'm looking for your 3 - liter Pepsis , the ones that are on sale this week . There don't seem to be any in the soft drink section .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We may be sold out of them . Let me check the back . ( The clerk goes to the storeroom , returning a few minutes later . ) I'm afraid we're out of stock . Would you like a rain check ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me get the manager to sign one for you .
segments.speaker: S2
